review: This is the best thing I've ever owned beats cable by far looking forward to buying another one soon
author: AjZakolski

review: Love my Fire TV stick. Easy to pack for family trips to ensure we have our must see tv and movies on Amazon Prime.
author: R. T. Smith

review: Best thing for me is save me lots of cable bills. I have so many choices of TV shows; Movies and U-tube type scripts. I am missing two channel.FOX cable News Network and CNBC Money  news. I am watching now Bloomberg TV for Money but not same level.Overall Fire TV Stick is really great.
author: Ashok O.

review: Unable to access Hulu......I keep getting messages that the content is prohibited. There is no technical help available on this, so the fire stick goes in the desk drawer never to return.
author: Robert N Breece

review: Awesome device, easy setup, works flawlessly!
author: tamika

review: An impressive device. Not much larger than a USB stick it packs a lot of features. Looking like many others to cut the cord, this device moves me well down the path to that end. I have ordered two more for my children's TVs.
author: R. C. Kuerth "R Kuerth"
